IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: INDEPENDENT, COEDUCATIONAL BOARDING AND DAY SECONDARY SCHOOL
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION IS COMMITTED TO DEVELOPING EACH STUDENT'S FULL INTELLECTUAL, ARTISTIC AND PHYSICAL POTENTIAL. STUDENTS ARE ENCOURAGED TO CHALLENGE THEMSELVES INTELLECTUALLY, TO PURSUE RIGOROUS LEARNING FOR ITS OWN SAKE, TO ACTIVELY PARTICIPATE IN AND APPRECIATE THE ARTS, TO CONTRIBUTE MEANINGFULLY TO THE WORK PROGRAM THAT SUSTAINS THE SCHOOL COMMUNITY AND THE FARM ON WHICH IT IS LOCATED, TO ENGAGE IN VIGOROUS ATHLETICS, AND TO DEVELOP A SOCIAL CONSCIOUSNESS AND WORLD VIEW THAT WILL PROVIDE THE FOUNDATION FOR LIFE-LONG MORAL AND INTELLECTUAL GROWTH. (ADOPTED 06/08/97)
IRS990.Desc: THE PUTNEY SCHOOL PROVIDES AN EDUCATIONAL PROGRAM FOR APPROXIMATELY 218 HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS IN A COEDUCATIONAL BOARDING SCHOOL SETTING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COLLECTIONS: THE SCHOOL'S COLLECTION IS COMPRISED OF VARIOUS ART OBJECTS THAT ARE HELD FOR EDUCATIONAL AND CURATORIAL PURPOSES. THE SCHOOL IS CURRENTLY IN THE PROCESS OF CATALOGING EACH PIECE. EACH ITEM IS CARED FOR, AND ACTIVITIES VERIFYING THEIR EXISTENCE AND ASSESSING THEIR CONDITION, ARE PERFORMED REGULARLY. THE SCHOOL HAS NOT ADOPTED A POLICY TO CAPITALIZE ITS COLLECTIONS; THEREFORE, IN ACCORDANCE WITH FASB 116, CONTRIBUTIONS OF ARTWORK ARE NOT RECOGNIZED IN REVENUE. IN THE EVENT OF THE SALE OF CONTIBUTED ARTWORK, THE SCHOOL RECOGNIZES THE PROCEEDS AND INCREASES THE APPROPRIATE CLASS OF NET ASSETS.
SEE DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF THE INTENDED USE OF ENDOWMENT FUNDS ON THE ORGANIZATION'S AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

THE PUTNEY SCHOOL, INC. IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAX UNDER SECTION 501(A) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AS AN ORGANIZATION DESCRIBED IN SECTION 501(C)(3). THE SCHOOL HAS ALSO BEEN CLASSIFIED AS AN ENTITY THAT IS NOT A PRIVATE FOUNDATION WITHIN THE MEANING OF SECTION 509(A) AND QUALIFIES FOR DEDUCTIBLE CONTRIBUTIONS. THE SCHOOL FOLLOWS FASB ASC 740-10, ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES, WHICH CLARIFIES THE ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES AND PRESCRIBES A RECOGNITION THRESHOLD AND MEASUREMENT ATTRIBUTE FOR FINANCIAL STATEMENT RECOGNITION AND MEASUREMENT OF TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN A TAX RETURN. FASB ASC 740-10 DID NOT HAVE A MATERIAL IMPACT ON THE SCHOOL'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE SCHOOL'S FEDERAL FORM 990 (RETURN OF ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAX) FOR FISCAL YEARS IS SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE IRS, GENERALLY FOR THREE YEARS AFTER FILING. THE SCHOOL RECOGNIZES INTEREST RELATED TO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS IN INTEREST EXPENSE AND PENALTIES THAT ARE INCLUDED WITHIN REPORTED EXPENSES. DURING THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2016, THE SCHOOL HAD NO INTEREST OR PENALTIES ACCRUED RELATED TO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS.
TUITION REDUCED BY FINANCIAL AID 2,828,498. ROUNDING ADJUSTMENT
THE POLICY IS STATED IN LITERATURE AND BROCHURES PROVIDED TO ALL CURRENT AND POTENTIAL STUDENTS. IT IS ALSO PUBLISHED IN LOCAL NEWSPAPERS AND ON THE SCHOOL'S WEBSITE.

ForeignIndividualsGrantsGrp.DescriptionOfNonCashAsstTxt: REDUCTION IN TUITION FOR STUDENTS WHO QUALIFY FOR FINANCIAL AID.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER AND CONTROLLER AND IS THEN PRESENTED TO THE AUDIT COMMITTEE FOR REVIEW, AND EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE FOR APPROVAL, BEFORE AFFIRMATION BY THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION REVIEWS THE POLICY EACH YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE HEAD OF SCHOOL'S SALARY IS DETERMINED AND APPROVED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD AND IS AVAILABLE FOR REVIEW BY ANY SCHOOL BOARD MEMBER. EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION FOR ALL EMPLOYEES, OTHER THEN THE HEAD OF SCHOOL, IS SET BY SCHOOL MANANGEMENT. MANAGEMENT INCREASES ARE TIED TO STAFF AND FACULTY INCREASES. FACULTY AND STAFF INCREASES ARE SET AT A PERCENTAGE EACH YEAR BY THE BOARD. THERE IS ALSO A SCALE ASSOCIATED WITH TIME SERVED FOR FACULTY. TO SET SALARIES, A COMPARISON IS DONE BETWEEN SIMILAR POSITIONS AT SCHOOLS IN THE INDEPENDENT SCHOOL ASSOCIATION OF NORTHERN NEW ENGLAND (ISANNE). OUR GOAL IS TO HAVE MANAGEMENT AT OR NEAR THE MEDIAN OF THEIR PEER GROUP.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS AN AUDIT COMMITTEE THAT HAS OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT THAT IS PERFORMED EACH YEAR. THIS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
